item.description: Contact Us You can reach us at team@technotes.org.
Demo of neolace The platform is currently in development, and we’re adding new features every week. You can see the platform in use for our TechNotes project:

item.title: Features of neolace
item.description: At neolace, we’re building the world’s best platform for sharing technical knowledge, with a particular focus on knowledge that’s shared and developed by multiple organizations - such as members of a consortium. Each neolace-powered site presents articles, images, drawings, and other technical content in a highly organized fashion, and the platform has clever innovations to make it easy to keep the content organized and up to date as it grows. Content can be restricted to selected groups or open to the public, and contributions can be required to receive approval from an editor before being accepted.
